page.title: 11THE GOLF COURSE,HOOKWAY.
page.content: The golf course covers eighty seven and a half acres,not all in our block, which is small for a golf course. It was established in 1975. { A set of golf clubs costs Â£120.}Golf ball sizes are 1.62 ins. and 1.68(American). It takes quite a few years just to learn golf.But if you are a {professional,}like Mr. Millhouse, you have to teach people to play golf which is a skill in itself.You have to serve a{three year apprenticeship}to become a professional. The golf course has a{junior section {and a ladies day.}Anyone under eighteen is classed as a junior. "In Britain golf is a cheap sport," declared Mr.Millhouse.On average the cost of joining a{club is Â£2 a week. { Between fifty and a hundred people {play everyday on this course.
